00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.DB2Database;

00027 public class AddNotNullConstraintChange extends AbstractChange {
00028     private String schemaName;
00029     private String tableName;
00030     private String columnName;
00031     private String defaultNullValue;
00032     private String columnDataType;
00033 
00034 
00035     public AddNotNullConstraintChange() {
00036         super("addNotNullConstraint", "Add Not-Null Constraint");
00037     }
00038 
00039     public String getSchemaName() {
00040         return schemaName;
00041     }
00042 
00043     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00044         this.schemaName = StringUtils.trimToNull(schemaName);
00045     }
00046 
00047     public String getTableName() {
00048         return tableName;
00049     }
00050 
00051     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00052         this.tableName = tableName;
00053     }
00054 
00055     public String getColumnName() {
00056         return columnName;
00057     }
00058 
00059     public void setColumnName(String columnName) {
00060         this.columnName = columnName;
00061     }
00062 
00063     public String getDefaultNullValue() {
00064         return defaultNullValue;
00065     }
00066 
00067     public void setDefaultNullValue(String defaultNullValue) {
00068         this.defaultNullValue = defaultNullValue;
00069     }
00070 
00071     public String getColumnDataType() {
00072         return columnDataType;
00073     }
00074 
00075     public void setColumnDataType(String columnDataType) {
00076         this.columnDataType = columnDataType;
00077     }
00078 
00079     public void validate(Database database) throws InvalidChangeDefinitionException {
00080         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(tableName) == null) {
00081             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("tableName is required", this);
00082         }
00083         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(columnName) == null) {
00084             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("columnName is required", this);
00085         }
00086 
00087     }
00088 
00089     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00090 
00091         if (database instanceof SQLiteDatabase) {
00092                 // return special statements for SQLite databases
00093                 return generateStatementsForSQLiteDatabase(database);
00094         }
00095 
00096         List<SqlStatement> statements = new ArrayList<SqlStatement>();
00097         String schemaName = getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName();
00098         
00099         if (defaultNullValue != null) {
00100             statements.add(new UpdateStatement(schemaName, getTableName())
00101                     .addNewColumnValue(getColumnName(), getDefaultNullValue())
00102                     .setWhereClause(getColumnName() + " IS NULL"));
00103         }
00104         
00105         statements.add(new SetNullableStatement(schemaName, getTableName(), getColumnName(), getColumnDataType(), false));
00106         if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00107             statements.add(new ReorganizeTableStatement(schemaName, getTableName()));
00108         }           
00109         
00110         return statements.toArray(new SqlStatement[statements.size()]);
00111     }
00112     
00113     private SqlStatement[] generateStatementsForSQLiteDatabase(Database database) 
00114                         throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00115         
00116         // SQLite does not support this ALTER TABLE operation until now.
00117                 // For more information see: http://www.sqlite.org/omitted.html.
00118                 // This is a small work around...
00119         
00120         List<SqlStatement> statements = new ArrayList<SqlStatement>();
00121         
00122         String schemaName = getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName();
00123         if (defaultNullValue != null) {
00124             statements.add(new UpdateStatement(schemaName, getTableName())
00125                     .addNewColumnValue(getColumnName(), getDefaultNullValue())
00126                     .setWhereClause(getColumnName() + " IS NULL"));
00127         }
00128         
00129 //              // ... test if column contains NULL values
00130 //              if (defaultNullValue == null) {
00131 //                      List<Map> null_rows = null;
00132 //                      try {
00133 //                              null_rows = database.getJdbcTemplate().
00134 //                                      queryForList(new RawSqlStatement(
00135 //                                              "SELECT * FROM `"+
00136 //                                              database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName())+
00137 //                                              "` WHERE `"+getColumnName()+"` IS NULL;"));
00138 //                      } catch (JDBCException e) {
00139 //                              e.printStackTrace();
00140 //                      }
00141 //              if (null_rows.size()>0) {
00142 //                      throw new UnsupportedChangeException(
00143 //                                      "Failed to add a Not-Null-Constraint because " +
00144 //                                      "some values are null. Use the " +
00145 //                                      "defaultNullValue attribute to define default " +
00146 //                                      "values for the existing null values.");
00147 //              }
00148 //      }
00149                 
00150                 // define alter table logic
00151                 AlterTableVisitor rename_alter_visitor = new AlterTableVisitor() {
00152                         public ColumnConfig[] getColumnsToAdd() {
00153                                 return new ColumnConfig[0];
00154                         }
00155                         public boolean copyThisColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00156                                 return true;
00157                         }
00158                         public boolean createThisColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00159                                 if (column.getName().equals(getColumnName())) {
00160                                         column.getConstraints().setNullable(false);
00161                                 }
00162                                 return true;
00163                         }
00164                         public boolean createThisIndex(Index index) {
00165                                 return true;
00166                         }
00167                 };
00168                 
00169                 try {
00170                 // alter table
00171                         statements.addAll(SQLiteDatabase.getAlterTableStatements(
00172                                         rename_alter_visitor,
00173                                         database,getSchemaName(),getTableName()));
00174         } catch (JDBCException e) {
00175                         e.printStackTrace();
00176                 }
00177         
00178         return statements.toArray(new SqlStatement[statements.size()]);
00179     }
00180 
00181     protected Change[] createInverses() {
00182         DropNotNullConstraintChange inverse = new DropNotNullConstraintChange();
00183         inverse.setColumnName(getColumnName());
00184         inverse.setSchemaName(getSchemaName());
00185         inverse.setTableName(getTableName());
00186         inverse.setColumnDataType(getColumnDataType());
00187 
00188         return new Change[]{
00189                 inverse
00190         };
00191     }
00192 
00193     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00194         return "Null constraint has been added to " + getTableName() + "." + getColumnName();
00195     }
00196 
00197 
00198     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00199         Element element = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("addNotNullConstraint");
00200         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00201             element.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00202         }
00203 
00204         element.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00205         element.setAttribute("columnName", getColumnName());
00206         element.setAttribute("defaultNullValue", getDefaultNullValue());
00207         return element;
00208     }
00209 
00210     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00211 
00212         Table table = new Table(getTableName());
00213 
00214         Column column = new Column();
00215         column.setTable(table);
00216         column.setName(getColumnName());
00217 
00218 
00219         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(table, column));
00220 
00221     }
00222 }
